CustomField.formula: IMAGE( IF( Service_score__c <= 2, "/img/samples/stars_100.gif", IF( Service_score__c <= 4 && Service_score__c > 2, "/img/samples/stars_200.gif", IF(Service_score__c<6 && Service_score__c > 4, "/img/samples/stars_300.gif", IF(Service_score__c<8 && Service_score__c > 6, "/img/samples/stars_400.gif", IF(Service_score__c<10 && Service_score__c > 8, "/img/samples/stars_500.gif", "/img/samples/stars_500.gif" ))))), "Rating")
CustomField.label: Pardot Rating
